snippet: In Travis County, which many consider the liberal hub of Texas, a controversial immigration-enforcement policy is at the forefront of the sheriff’s race.
lead_paragraph: In Travis County, which many consider the liberal hub of Texas, a controversial immigration-enforcement policy is at the forefront of the sheriff’s race.

headline.seo: Immigration Policy at Issue in Primary for Sheriff in Travis County, Texas
headline.main: Immigration Policy at Issue in Democratic Primary for Sheriff in Travis County
headline.print_headline: Immigration Policy at Issue in Democratic Primary for Sheriff in Travis County
